alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Monmouth; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 2:53PM EDT until July 25 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Somerset County in northern New Jersey... Northeastern Monmouth County in central New Jersey... Middlesex County in northern New Jersey... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 253 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Brunswick, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Somerville, Sandy Hook, Somerset, Edison, Middletown, Old Bridge, East Brunswick, South Brunswick, Sayreville, North Brunswick, Carteret, Middlesex, Bound Brook, Manville, Matawan, Jamesburg, Highlands and Millstone. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 9 and 13. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 16. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 114 and 134. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
